mapper.select: SELECT id, pipeline_record_id, stage_id, stage_name, status, trigger_type, execution_time, project_id, object_version_number, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date FROM devops_cd_stage_record dcsr WHERE dcsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} ORDER BY dcsr.sequence ASC limit 1

SELECT dcsr1.* FROM devops_cd_stage_record dcsr1 WHERE dcsr1.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} AND dcsr1.sequence >= ( SELECT dcsr.sequence FROM devops_cd_stage_record dcsr WHERE dcsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} AND (dcsr.`status` = 'FAILED' or dcsr.status='CANCELED') )
SELECT dcsr.* FROM devops_cd_stage_record dcsr WHERE dcsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} AND (dcsr.`status` = 'FAILED' or dcsr.status='CANCELED')
SELECT dcsr.* FROM devops_cd_stage_record dcsr WHERE dcsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} AND (dcsr.`status` = 'PENDING' or dcsr.status='RUNNING')
